name: Fudge Torte
steps: Preheat oven to 325. Butter 9 in. round cake pan. Dust with sugar, set aside.
Whip sugar and eggs to ribbon stage, about 5 minutes.
Heat butter and chocolate in saucepan until melted. Remove and whisk in preserves.
Fold into egg mixture until incorporated, then mix in flour and salt.
Pour into pan and bake for 25 minutes. Serve chilled with fruit.
